comment.author: 24546064@N07
comment._content: I'm writing a novel set in 1893. The first couple of chapters take place at the Chicago World's Fair (Columbian Exposition). I need as realistic a view of what they saw and experienced as possible and these pictures are invaluable. Thank you.
